introduce: Hello, I am a German-speaking DevSecOps and frontend developer from Wermelskirchen. My focus is on creating solutions that are both visually compelling and user-friendly, while ensuring the highest security standards.
introduce-location: Adaptable to various work settings, I can work efficiently both on-site in Wermelskirchen (+25km) and remotely.
introduce-cognition: I am open-minded and continuously seek personal challenges to enhance my knowledge and skills.
introduce-mindset: In my role as a DevSecOps professional, I view security as more than just a requirement; it’s an integral part of a creative problem-solving process. I take pride in transforming complex security challenges into streamlined, automated solutions that are both user-friendly and effective. My goal is to help you achieve your objectives while bringing your visions to life in a secure and efficient manner.
skillset-journey: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, utilizing various frontend technologies and concepts. I am eager to embrace new technologies and methodologies, continuously improving my skills to stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skillset-cta: Feel free to reach out to me. I look forward to building on my existing knowledge.
projects-descrip: Explore a selection of my work here — interact with the projects to see my skills in action.
reference-headline: What my colleagues say about me
reference-vanessa: Working with Pascal was an incredibly rewarding and enjoyable experience. He consistently approached challenges with a solution-oriented mindset, remained impressively composed under pressure, and was always eager to help. His deep knowledge and creative ideas propelled our team forward, and I learned a lot from his expertise. Beyond his professionalism, Pascal's great sense of humor made our teamwork genuinely enjoyable. I would be thrilled to work with him again!
reference-rene: Pascal was an extremely hard-working employee who consistently maintained a clear overview of the project. His friendly demeanor and strong teamwork skills made him a valued colleague. I can recommend him without reservation.
reference-next: Here is space for your recommendation for the next joint project.
contact-cta: Need a solution? Reach out to me!
contact-cta2: Get in touch using this form — I'm eager to hear your ideas and contribute to your projects with my work.
form-question-name-error: Oops! It seems your name is missing!
form-question-text-error: What do you need to develop?
privacy-policy3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
